article_title: Joan Kwiatkowski: PACE could ease R.I. Medicaid crisis
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: On Oct. 24, more than 500 people gathered at a conference hosted by Leadership Rhode Island to explore strength-based leadership at the individual, community and state level. The conference's keynote speaker, Jim Clifton, chairman and CEO of Gallup Inc., made a bold statement that if “the greatest little State in the Union” created and implemented strategies based on the strengths of every community, Rhode Island could serve as a role model for the nation and the world.PACE
article_metadata.author: Joan Kwiatkowski
